content: feel the sunshine on your skin with this breezy and beautiful tank top whether it s a day at the farmers market a day at the beach or a night out on the town you ll be ready to strut your stuff in this summertime staple **what s included ** 11 page printable pdf download written instructions for women s sizes xs-5x photos for visual aid throughout the pattern links to video tutorial and stitch tutorials **pattern difficulty ** intermediate **construction of garment ** top down **sizing & yardage ** xs 28-30 bust s 32-34 m 36-38 l 40-42 xl 44-46 2x 48-50 3x 52-54 4x 56-58 5x 60-62 garment has approximately 2 positive ease **yarn ** ** woolen cotton™ 1 ** dk 50% merino wool 50% pima cotton 218 yds/100g cedar heather 61010 3 3 3 4 4 4 5 5 5 hanks **video tutorial ** all of my patterns are thoroughly tested by experienced pattern testers and fellow designers to ensure you get a pattern that is easy to read and follow all of my patterns are in us terms due to the nature of the pdf files sales i will not refund any patterns however i am always available via email or a message here on ravelry if you have any questions about the patterns you may sell what you produce from my patterns but the pattern itself is copyrighted and may not be shared or changed in part or in whole my photos are also copyrighted and may never be used to sell the products you make ** love this pattern stay up to date on all things two brothers blankets including new patterns releases and fun events by subscribing to my newsletter 2 ** *listing contains affiliate links * 1 https //shrsl com/4il0i 2 https //www twobrothersblankets com/subscribe/
